articles.content:

articles.title: In Argentina, a Battle Over Gender-Inclusive Language in Classrooms
articles.description: The city of Buenos Aires banned gender-neutral language in schools, reigniting off a debate that is reverberating across the world.

articles.description: Three weeks after his contract expired at Juventus, the 28-year-old Argentina international agreed to a three-year deal at Roma, the capital club announced on Wednesday.

articles.title: Soccer-Dybala joins AS Roma on free transfer
articles.description: Argentina international forward Paulo Dybala has joined Italian side AS Roma on a free transfer following his departure from Juventus, the Europa Conference League champions said on Wednesday. Dybala, who was linked with a transfer to Serie A side Inter Milan after his deal with Juventus expired, has signed a three-year contract with Roma.
